To be brutally honest, without a proper gravity turn you are wasting a crazy amount of fuel on a rocket that would otherwise be capable of [landing and returning from the Mun](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/126257-VIDEO-Tutorial-Reaching-Munar-Orbit).
